question:
Hello, AI model. You are a naming expert. I now need you to name my great work of art. My painting is filled with soft tones and changes in light and shadow. The surface of the water pool has slight ripples, reflecting the colors of the sky and scenery. Water lily flowers are scattered on the water surface, mostly round in shape, with petals sometimes appearing pink, white, or light purple. Leaves float on the water surface, appearing green or slightly yellow. A great work needs a great name, the name needs to be beautiful, exquisite, but also easy to understand. The name needs to be exactly 5 words. Generate 50 names for me in total, all names must start with [beautiful] and also end with [beautiful]. For better readability, please output in the format of 1.text1
2.text2
3.text3
4.text4
5.text5
.

corresponding_parts.名字:
#CODE#请你用去除非名字的所有信息后，分割并输出所有模型生成的名字，模型回答一般用index+
分割名字，请不要去重，例如：['1. Compendium of Materia Medica', '2. Compendium of Herbs', '3. Woody Channel Steel']，回答中一般容易在末尾生成一些无效信息，比如：以上是所有我生成的名字...请注意删除回答末尾的额外信息

sub_questions.question: 是否给出了作品的名字
是否列举了50个名字
sub_questions.能力项: 单元数量合规、生成名字/标题

sub_questions.question: 每个名字是否都是5个字
每个名字是否都以【beautiful】开头
名字是否避免重复
每个名字是否都以【beautiful】结尾
